articles.title: Alysa Liu dazzles to win figure skating gold, ending a 24-year Olympic drought for US women - AP News
articles.description: Alysa Liu won Olympic gold for the U.S. in women’s figure skating, ending a 24-year drought. Liu delivered a near-flawless free skate at the Milan Cortina Games to beat out Kaori Sakamoto and Ami Nakai of Japan on Thursday night. Liu had returned to the sport…

articles.title: Cowboys to play a 3-4 base defense for first time since 2012 - NBC Sports
articles.description: The Cowboys hired Christian Parker from the Eagles to turn around a defense that set the team record for points allowed in 2025.

articles.title: U.S. wins Olympic gold medal in women's hockey in overtime victory over rival Canada - NBC News
articles.description: Team USA defeated Canada in the women's gold medal hockey game at the Milan Cortina Winter Olympics.

articles.title: Amber Glenn Rebounds From Short Program Error With Stunning Olympic Free Skate - Forbes
articles.description: After a devastating short program error, figure skater Amber Glenn delivered a triumphant Olympic free skate, landing a triple axel to keep her medal hopes alive heading into the final groups in Milano Cortina.

articles.description: U.S. speedskater Jordan Stolz had a lot of hype accompanying him in these Winter Olympic Games. He's now got two gold medals, one silver, with one event to go.

articles.description: Ronda Rousey and Gina Carano will undergo extensive medical and neurological testing ahead of their May 16 MMA comeback clash, according to the California State Athletic Commission.
